turns.content:
「ゴージャスで宝石の装飾のあるウェディングドレス風のダンス用ドレスで踊っている少女

」の超高精細の長文英語プロンプトを書いて。

A young girl danced gracefully across the ballroom floor, adorned in a stunning dance dress that resembled a gorgeous, jewel-encrusted wedding gown. The intricate details of the dress shimmered under the bright lights, casting a beautiful glow around her as she twirled and spun.
The dress itself was a masterpiece of design and craftsmanship, with layers of delicate tulle and chiffon draped elegantly around the young girl’s figure. The bodice was covered in intricate beading and sparkling jewels, adding to the dress’s opulent appearance.
As she danced, the girl’s movements were fluid and effortless, her feet gliding across the floor with grace and precision. The dress billowed and flowed around her, creating a breathtaking sight that left the audience in awe.
The girl’s beauty was further enhanced by her radiant smile, which lit up the entire ballroom and filled the air with a contagious joy. It was clear that she was thoroughly enjoying the moment, lost in the music and the magic of the evening.
The entire scene was a testament to the power of beauty and artistry, as the girl’s stunning dance dress brought together elements of fashion, design, and performance to create a truly unforgettable experience.

「AIが考える一番エレガントな女子
高校制服
」の超高精細の長文英語プロンプトを書いて。

The most elegant high school girl as envisioned by AI would likely wear a beautifully designed school uniform that exudes class and sophistication. The uniform would be tailored to fit her body perfectly, highlighting her natural curves and creating a sense of understated elegance.
The color scheme of the uniform would be simple and classic, with a crisp white blouse and a navy blue skirt. The blouse would be made of high-quality cotton or silk, with delicate buttons and a subtle collar that adds a touch of refinement to the overall look.
The skirt would be knee-length and pleated, made of a durable and comfortable material that allows for ease of movement. It would be paired with a matching blazer that fits snugly around her waist, creating a streamlined silhouette that accentuates her figure.
The girl’s hair would be styled in a neat and polished manner, with soft waves cascading down her back or a sleek and sophisticated updo that adds a touch of elegance to her overall appearance. Her makeup would be understated yet flawless, with just a hint of color on her lips and a subtle flush on her cheeks.
When this AI-imagined high school girl walks down the hallway, she exudes confidence and poise, embodying the very essence of elegance. Her grace and sophistication set her apart from her peers, leaving a lasting impression on all those who are fortunate enough to cross her path.

「AIが考える一番かわいい女子高生

」の超高精細の長文英語プロンプトを書いて。

As envisioned by AI, the cutest high school girl would likely have a youthful and playful style that highlights her natural beauty and charm. She would be the embodiment of innocence and purity, with a bright and infectious smile that lights up any room she enters.
Her fashion sense would be cute and trendy, with pastel colors, frilly accents, and fun accessories that add a touch of whimsy to her overall look. She might wear a cute skirt or dress with a playful pattern, paired with a bright-colored top or sweater.
Her hair would be styled in loose and carefree waves or pulled back into a playful ponytail or bun, adding to her youthful and cheerful appearance. Her makeup would be minimal and natural, with just a touch of mascara and lip gloss to enhance her features.
In addition to her adorable appearance, the cutest high school girl would also have a sweet and friendly personality, always willing to lend a helping hand or offer a kind word to those around her. Her positive energy and infectious spirit would make her the most beloved and popular girl in her school.
